content.html: Today is a significant day I never thought I'd be 'celebrating'. It's the 1-year anniversary of my initial brain tumour diagnosis. It’s been quite a year! I'd like to thank everyone for their support. Chemotherapy should be finished in October, then hopefully back to “normal”!
content.value:
Today is a significant day I never thought I'd be 'celebrating'. 

It's the 1-year anniversary of my initial brain tumour diagnosis. It’s been quite a year! I'd like to thank everyone for their support. Chemotherapy should be finished in October, then hopefully back to “normal”!
